description:
Rise and shine, skier. These midweight merino wool ski socks are the optimal choice for those who thrive from sunup until sundown. Luxurious cushioning envelops your foot and shin, enhancing your comfort, while impact protection ensures durability. With a secure fit that never sags, you'll feel like you're walking on sunshine, even when the snow is falling outside.

  • Made of merino wool, nylon and spandex
  • Performance fit guarantees a snug, blister-resistant experience that keeps you connected and comfortable in your boots, run after run
  • All-season performers, these midweight socks naturally adapt to keep your feet at the right temperature
  • Over-the-calf socks typically cover the leg to just below the knee
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Daybreak Midweight with Cushion OTC Socks - Women's
